wikipedia_page.main: Jarrett Albert Hart (born 4 November 1980 in London) is a British professional basketball player. He is a 1.95 m (6 ft 4¾ in) tall point guard-shooting guard. He is currently playing with Keravnos Strovolos in Cyprus. Although born in England he was raised in Little Rock, Arkansas where he was a teammate of current Atlanta Hawks guard Joe Johnson at Little Rock Central High School.
